name: Thriving Stylist Podcast
who_you_serve: The podcast serves beauty professionals, including hair stylists, salon owners, and independent educators, focusing on their business growth and marketing strategies.
what_you_do: The Thriving Stylist Podcast provides simplified business-building techniques and actionable marketing education for stylists.
signature_programs: Wealthiest Year Yet Planner, 2026 Trend Report, Thriving Leadership Method, Grow My Clientele Calculator
current_projects: Latest episode focuses on end-of-year retail strategy for salons.
